name: ablgrpd

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cgrp))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cabl))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c0, cgrp))
body.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈ Grp)
⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Abel)
⊣ (c0 ∈ Abel → c0 ∈ Grp)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cgrp))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cabl))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c0, cgrp))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈ Grp)
⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Abel)
⊣ (c0 ∈ Abel → c0 ∈ Grp)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cgrp))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cabl))
